channel.title: VNC on OmicX
channel.description: Recent content in VNC on OmicX

item.title: Setup TigerVNC Server and Windows Client
item.description: The Virtual Network Computer (VNC) enables people to access the remote desktop environment. It is a graphical desktop sharing system that uses the Remote Frame Buffer protocol (RFB). This post introduces install and configure TigerVNC server in Debian 12/bookworm and Windows client.
